data.actual_result: The fields remain in your previous language, requiring you to refresh for the change to properly apply
data.expected_result: The fields should be in your newly chosen language
data.short_description: Payment modal fields don't adapt initially after changing your client language
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your client language to something other than your currently chosen one - Go into your User Settings -> Billing - Click on the Add Payment Method -> Credit Card and observe the fields
